name: Pixel_Fight
description:
I bet there  isn't any human left on this planet who would play a 2d game with no sound only to lose at level 2! 

ALAS! If you still wanna play this game then comeon buddy try beating 3000 points and send me your scorecard @Tihsrah_ (instagram) ! {lol if you can!}

#This is my first Game i ever made, so it 's short. Please give me Feedback, i will appreciate #that! - Thanks to everybody who supports me!
